snippet.title: Hellbreach: Vegas - Co-op Trailer @ Gamescom -  Sign-up for the Playtest!
snippet.description:
Sign-up now for the full weekend Co-Op Playtest coming on:
29/09/23 ---- 01/10/23


https://store.steampowered.com/app/1691320/Hellbreach_Vegas/

Hellbreach: Vegas is a Wave-based First-Person Shooter! How long can you survive as hordes of Demons invade Vegas?

Kill, Earn Cash and take a spin on fruit machines to survive to the next round! Play solo or in a team of up to four and escape the Hellbreach… Are you ready to try your chances?

Stay up to date with Hellbreach: Vegas and Iceberg Interactive: 

Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/PlayHellbreach
https://www.facebook.com/iceberginteractive

Twitter:
https://twitter.com/PlayHellbreach
http://twitter.com/Iceberg_Int

Instagram:
https://www.instagram.com/playhellbreach/
https://www.instagram.com/iceberg_int/

Discord: http://discord.gg/iceberginteractive
Discord Hellbreach: https://discord.gg/33MCdgms
Steam publisher page: http://bit.ly/IcebergOnSteam
